ComicInfo.Title: Crossed Wires, Part One; The Night Before Christmas; Personal Ad; Desert Storms, Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
Crossed Wires, Part One: After breaking up with her boyfriend, Sally receives a strange call from a strange, yet familiar voice, and the call soon turns into a session of phone sex.
The Night Before Christmas: The Skunk Sisters turn the famous poem into an opportunity to seduce two handsome reindeer stuck by the side of the road.
Personal Ad: A very particular submissive tries to advertise for a dominant.
Desert Storms, Part One: A young Japanese girl commits herself to joining the harem of a Saudi sheik for five years.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:27:13. [Issue ID 248481]
ComicInfo.Writer: Paul Kidd,Clement Clarke Moore,James Hardiman,Chris Whalen,Michael Hirtes
ComicInfo.Penciller: Kurt Wilcken,James Hardiman,Chris Whalen,Dean Lee Norton
ComicInfo.Inker: Kurt Wilcken,James Hardiman,Chris Whalen,Dean Lee Norton
ComicInfo.Letterer: Kurt Wilcken,James Hardiman,Chris Whalen,Dean Lee Norton
